title: Did The FBI Manipulate Video Evidence? (Ep 1887)
description:
In this episode, I address the shocking new report indicating that the FBI may have manipulated a video of the January 6th bomber. 

News Picks:

Did the FBI tamper with the January 6th “bomber” video?


Google is punishing Republicans who speak out against Big Tech. 


Why is the WEF so obsessed with the battery in your electric car?


Twitter censors lose access to enforcement tools to manage “disinformation.”


California liberals are at war with each other over tax hikes.

Biden Pentagon official joins TikTok amid review of the Chinese app.



An interesting article about auto-immune disorders.

Facebook’s stock is getting crushed.
